OrderItemGroup.name: OrderItemGroup
OrderItemGroup.description: Stores the group information for line items in an order. It also stores the aggregated line field information (subtotal). It contains a parent-child relationship to order.

OrderId.description: ID of the order that this order product is a child of.

SortOrder.description: Number indicating the sort order selected by the user.

SummarySubtotal.description: The total amount of all the line items in the group.
